channel.title: I need a tut!
channel.description:
i need a tut on the following
problem: way to many massers in my server, ive spent 3-4 days coding it, and i dont want it to be ruined because some people like to mass, so can somebody PLEASE give me something that auto kicks them or something or gives them warnings if they click over a certain speed?
problem:way too many massers
i need the solution: i was hoping for something that could kick them if they click faster than a set speed, but i have no idea how i can make this, so if someebody could pelase post a tut, because they all were deleted, on how to do this, please!! help me. thanks!
